name: AFISURU HEALTH CENTRE
directions:
From Sabo or Coca-Cola Express (Sagamu)
Take a car going towards Ogijo.
Drop at PZ Estate Road, opposite Energy Switch Filling Station.
From PZ Estate Road
You can either take a bike or walk.

Walking Directions:
From PZ Estate Street, take the 2nd turning on the left.
Take the first turning on the right — this road is opposite a hotel.
Take the first turning on the left, just after the Foursquare Church.
Afisuru Health Centre is located beside an Anglican Church.

name: AGBOWA IBIDO
directions:
Take a bike to Agbowa Ibido Health centre.
It is located behind the Ibido Palace.

name: AIYEGBAMI
directions: Take a bike to Shode, Aiyegbami Health centre

name: AJAKA
directions:
Take a bike to Ajaka Health centre.
It is beside the mosque around Awolowo Market.
Located on the street beside the Mobil Filling Station.

name: AJEGUNLE
directions:
Take a car from Sabo or Coca-Cola Express in Sagamu going to Ogijo.
Drop at the park.
Take a keke (tricycle) to Ita-Oluwo.
From Ita-Oluwo, take a bike to Ajegunle Health centre

name: AMODU ALOWOMATANA
directions:
Take a bike to Amodu Alowomatan Health centre, Ijaba.
Located beside Noibi Mosque.

name: ARUBA
directions:
Take a bike to Aruba Health centre.
Located close to Aruba Power Line.

name: BATORO
directions:
Take a bike to Batoro Health centre.
Located opposite Batoro Palace.

name: EMUREN
directions:
From Sabo, Sagamu, take a bike to Emuren Health centre.
Located close to the Emuren Garage where bikemen stay

name: IJAGBA
directions:
Take a bike to Ijagba Health centre.
Located beside Ijagba Palace.

name: IPOJI
directions: Take a bike to Ipoji Health centre, it is along OOUTH road

name: ISOTE
directions: Take a bike to Isote Health centre

name: ITUNSOKU
directions: Take a bike to Baruwa, Itunsoku Health Centre. The street is on the left side of KFC. The facility is located near the garage that overlooks Akarigbo Road.

name: LATAWA
directions: Take a bike to Latawa Health centre

name: LEGACY HC
directions:
Take a bike to Legacy HC at Isale Oko.
Located on the street between NNPC and Rain Oil.
The street is close to the Veterinary Hospital, Isale Oko

name: LIKOSI
directions:
Take a keke (tricycle) from Sagamu to Likosi Bus Stop.
Likosi HC is located around that area.

name: MAKUN OJUMELE
directions:
Take a bike to Makun HC.
Located before the Army Children School, Makun, opposite the NYSC Secretariat.

name: OGIJO HC
directions:
Take a car from Sabo or Coca-Cola Express in Sagamu going to Ogijo.
Drop at the park and walk towards the health centre.
It is located opposite St. John School’s football field.

name: OGEDE
directions:
Take a car from Sabo or Coca-Cola Express in Sagamu going to Ogijo.
Drop at the park.
Ask for directions to where you can take a bike to Ogede.
Take a bike to Ogede Health Centre.

name: OWODE EPOTA
directions:
Take a bike to Kara/Owode Epota.
Located down the road beside Remo Divisional High School

name: SABO AGURA
directions:
Take a bike to Agura Health centre.
Located on Skylark Hospital Road.

name: SABO GRA
directions:
Take a bike to Onijoku.
The health centre is located within the Onijoku Palace, close to Sabo Underbridge

name: SIMAWA
directions:
Take a keke (tricycle) or bike from Sabo to Likosi Bus Stop.
From Likosi, take a bike to Simawa Health centre.
Located opposite Simawa High School

name: SOTUBO
directions:
Take a keke (tricycle) to Sotubo.
Drop at the health centre — the signboard is visible along Sagamu–Ikorodu Road.
